summary: Fix for Cicero standing way too close to the player.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Cicero Distance Fix[/b]
[img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/1434/1824311338891116.jpg[/img]

Cicero use to stay uncomfortably close to the player in vanilla game, sometime pushing you off cliffs or blocking your path. Since I like to keep Cicero as a follower I modified the minimum distance he should keep from the player character making it similar to other followers.

[b][color=green]This little mod is almost weightless (1kb) since it just change a \"number\" and nothing else. There should be no issue or conflict with anything. [/color][/b]

Enjoy!
author: Misthero
